snippet: A Mexican immigrant who lived for nine months in the basement of a Denver church to avoid deportation left the sanctuary Tuesday, after immigration authorities notified him that they would not carry out his removal.
abstract: Mexican immigrant Arturo Hernandez Garcia leaves basement of First Unitarian Church in Denver after immigration authorities say they will not act on his deportation order; had sought sanctuary at church for nine months in order to avoid deportation.
lead_paragraph: A Mexican immigrant who lived for nine months in the basement of a Denver church to avoid deportation left the sanctuary Tuesday, after immigration authorities notified him that they would not carry out his removal.

headline.main: Colorado: Immigrant Leaves Sanctuary After 9 Months
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Immigrant Leaves Sanctuary After 9 Months
